name: Ddream Ddiver (NES)
description:
In Ddream Ddiver you play the role of a slumbering scientist, trying to stay asleep long enough to talk to her late father.

Dodge sea creatures, avoid jagged rocks, and find your way to the dive bar.

Explore creepy caves, crystal formations and ancient ruins as you breaststroke your way through 30 stages of illusion.

Dream in 8-bit with brand new chiptunes and graphics.

You will need an NES emulator or flashcart to play Ddream Ddiver.

We recommend FCEUX.
